name: Eat The Horses!
description:
You are very hungry. Like very hungry that you could eat a horse. So you do that.

For the Game Off 2022!

My cliche is "I'm so hungry that I could eat a horse"

Special thanks  for WordedPuppet for the music for the game! https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCdNHTlWrSTVnbUd9HbWpt9A
